name: Arrow of Code
body:
## My works...
### Zombipher:

I'm still working on this encryption cipher. I'm sure I'll patch it for the last time, and implement it here. Until then, you can [check out how it works](https://github.com/Wafflespeanut/Python/tree/master/Encryption)...

***

Well, I once _forked_ [2048](http://wafflespeanut.github.io/2048) and [Fe-26](http://wafflespeanut.github.io/Fe-26), with a plan to twitch some other day (_probably_)...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
